Paragraph.Text: Solar Panels are a low maintenance source of renewable power. They must be placed with direct access to the sky above them and will only generate power during the day. They will distribute this power to any adjacent machine, Power Storage Block or Laser Power Transmitter.
Solar Panels have a low internal power capacity and should therefore be backed up by a suitable number of Power Storage Blocks to ensure a reliable supply of power at all times.
